snippet: The British street artist’s stencils and graffiti epigrams are popping up across the city, creating a sort of scavenger hunt for admirers.
abstract: Editorial welcomes pseudonymous British street artist Banksy to New York for the month of October with a project he is calling 'Better Out Than In'; notes that his stencils and graffiti epigrams are popping up across the city, creating a sort of scavenger hunt for admirers.
lead_paragraph: The British street artist’s stencils and graffiti epigrams are popping up across the city, creating a sort of scavenger hunt for admirers.
